actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Public Works (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-1365.

official_title: Resolution reported authorizing the printing of a report relating to Water Pollution Control Programs.

summary.text: Authorizes the printing of the report (two volumes) entitled, "Evaluation of Techniques for Cost-Benefit Analysis of Water Pollution Control Programs and Policies", as a Senate document. Requires the printing of five hundred additional copies of such document for the use of the Senate Committee on Public Works.

titles.title: Resolution reported authorizing the printing of a report relating to Water Pollution Control Programs.
